AuthService.description: Handles all authentication operations including Firebase Auth integration, user registration/login for both adults and children, token management, and account operations.

ApiService.description: Base API service handling all HTTP requests with Dio, including authentication interceptor, error handling, and file upload/download capabilities.

UserModel.description: User model representing both adult and child accounts with role-specific fields and computed properties.

NotificationService.description: Handles push notifications via Firebase Cloud Messaging and local notifications, including token management, permission handling, and notification history.

BankService.description: Manages state for user accounts, balances, transfers, and withdrawal requests.

AccountModel.description: Model representing bank accounts in the Home Hustle app including primary, savings, spending, and goals accounts with limits and savings goal tracking.

JobModel.description: Model representing a job posting in the Home Hustle app with support for both family and public jobs, wage types, applications, and reviews.

NotificationModel.description: Model representing notifications in the Home Hustle app including push notifications, notification actions, and user notification preferences.

TransactionModel.description: Model representing financial transactions in the Home Hustle app including job payments, store purchases, transfers, and transaction summaries for reporting.

Constants.description: Core constants file containing all app-wide constants including API config, storage keys, enums, validation rules, UI constants, and asset paths.

Theme.description: App theme configuration for Material Design 3 with light/dark themes and role-specific customizations for adults and children.

SnackbarUtils.description: Utility functions for displaying consistent snackbar notifications throughout the app with success, error, warning, and info variants.

FormatUtils.description: Utility class containing all formatting functions used throughout the app including currency, date/time, phone numbers, names, file sizes, and various display formatters.

Validators.description: Utility class containing all form validation functions used throughout the app including email, password, name, currency, age, and job-specific validations.
